name: berliner
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person from Berlin in Germany: Peter is a 22-year-old Berliner. It's a busy restaurant, popular with Berliners and tourists.
a doughnut (= a small, circular cake, fried in hot fat) with jam inside and usually a sugar covering: A Berliner is made from sweet yeasted dough fried in fat or oil.
More examplesFewer examplesAs a Berliner, I have lived through some interesting times.Hanna is a Berliner by birth but now lives in Manhattan.He describes himself as "a Berliner through and through."In the 1990s many young Berliners were struggling to make ends meet.John F. Kennedy's famous declaration "I am a Berliner" would according to a literal translation mean "I am a jam doughnut."
